channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’ve Tested 1,000+ Sex Toys. These 8 Are What I Always Recommend
item.description: With close to two decades of experience, these are the sex toys I have no trouble recommending to most people.

item.title: Microdosing for Depression Appears to Work About as Well as Drinking Coffee
item.description: For years, people from CEOs to novelists have taken tiny amounts of psychedelics to support well-being. New research shows that benefits for depressio...

item.title: HigherDose Red Light Hat Review: Scalp Savior (2026)
item.description: Turns out, red light isn’t just for your face. HigherDose’s Red Light Hat has given me the best hair and scalp I’ve had in years.

item.title: How Sequoia-backed Ethos reached the public market while rivals fell short
item.description: The profitable life-insurance platform was one of the first major tech companies to test the 2026 public markets.

item.title: How Sequoia-backed Ethos reached the public market while rivals fell short
item.description: The profitable life-insurance platform was one of the first major tech companies to test the 2026 public markets.

item.title: Silicon Valley Tech Workers Are Campaigning to Get ICE Out of US Cities
item.description: Even as Big Tech CEOs curry favor with President Trump, Silicon Valley employees are calling on their bosses to use their influence to help stop his i...

item.title: Last 24 hours to grab your +1 pass at 50% off to TechCrunch Disrupt 2026
item.description: Today is the last day to lock in a +1 pass at 50% off to TechCrunch Disrupt 2026, happening on October 13-15 in San Francisco. Register here.

item.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI in talks to merge, according to reports
item.description: This merger would bring the Grok chatbot, Starlink satellites, and SpaceX rockets together under one corporation.

item.title: The iPhone just had its best quarter ever
item.description: Growth in regions like China and India are credited with pushing Apple's phone sales higher than ever.

item.title: Guys, I don’t think Tim Cook knows how to monetize AI
item.description: One intrepid Morgan Stanley analyst dared to ask how Apple will make money on its AI investments. The answer will not shock you.
